channel.title: Artist: Hands Like Houses - Album: Ground Dweller
channel.description:
Has anybody heard of this band? It's sort of generic sounding, but I really enjoy it. Just the right amount of everything, not too much screaming, there's barely any at all to be honest.
My favorite song is This Ain't No Place for Animals.
Give them a listen, I found the band through suggestions by A Day to Remember music videos.

item.title: Artist: Hands Like Houses - Album: Ground Dweller
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:4, topic:515806”]Judging from the video:

The drums sound amazing, and the guitar is nice aswell but the drums stand out. The singer reminds me of a mix between green day and sleeping with sirens. Not a fan of the vocals.[/quote]

The drums is what keeps me listening to this band, it sounds amazing when you blast it with some headphones. As for the vocals they’re a bit weak, yes.

Read full topic
